definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc

sentences.english: They took their seats at the small round table.
sentences.chinese: 他們在小圓桌旁坐了下來。

sentences.english: The Round Table broke up following the death of Arthur.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟死後，圓桌騎士各奔東西。

sentences.english: As to the 3rd, have to count roundlet desk to go up that " antependium " .
sentences.chinese: 至於第三嘛，就得數小圓桌上的那塊“桌布”了。

sentences.english: The little round table and chairs is a great place to work or have breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 小圓桌和椅子用來喫早飯或者工作都可以。

sentences.english: The stories of the Knights of the Round Table make up the Arthurian cycle.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王傳奇是由一些圓桌武士的故事構成。

sentences.english: In the centre of the round table, on a circular glass stand, were some little china figures.
sentences.chinese: 原來在圓桌中央的玻璃圓托盤裏擺着幾個小瓷人兒。

sentences.english: In the castle he had a round table, where he sat with his knights.
sentences.chinese: 在城堡裏他有一張圓桌，他和他的騎士們都坐在那裏。

sentences.english: A cloth had been spread over a little round table on which was a vase of fragrant plum blossom.
sentences.chinese: 小圓桌鋪上了檯布，添了瓶盛開的臘梅，吐着幽香。

sentences.english: The feature in this section seems to set up a round-table conversation.
sentences.chinese: 本期的“注目”專題，更像是試圖搭建一次圓桌對話。

sentences.english: This excludes several hundred round-table meetings where numerous companies were present.
sentences.chinese: 這還沒有包括數百次有多家公司代表在場的圓桌會議。

sentences.english: My Cuisine Pioneer assignment was the Round Table Steak House.
sentences.chinese: 這次先鋒食客被安排在圓桌武士牛排屋。

sentences.english: A high-level round-table conference and two parallel seminars will be held during the two-day symposium.
sentences.chinese: 本次研討會設有高層圓桌會議和兩個平行研討會。

sentences.english: We laid down our bikes along the round tables and dug in.
sentences.chinese: 我們把自行車靠在圓桌上，開始埋頭喫飯。

sentences.english: One small round table, for small adhoc meetings of 2-3 people.
sentences.chinese: 還需要一個小圓桌，供2至3人的小型會議使用。

sentences.english: The story of King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table has been one of the most popular stories in world literature.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王與圓桌騎士的故事在世界文學中名氣很大。

sentences.english: Recordings of previous roundtables are all available here.
sentences.chinese: 以往的圓桌會議錄音也可以找到。

definition: guests feel at home (in a hotel, guest house etc)/a home away from home
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
